nfr.add_Nfr: Click here to add a new Customer RFQ.
nfr.fetch: Click this button to fetch the latest data from SAP.
nfr.search: Search for specific data from here.
nfr.refresh: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.
nfr.viewNPart: Click here to view the Customer RFQ Part listing.
nfr.DeleteNfr: Click here to delete the Customer RFQ.
nfr.nfrSummary: Click on the Customer RFQ number to view the summary from here.
nfr.view: View detailed Customer RFQ from here.
nfr.edit: Click here to edit the Customer RFQ.
nfr.viewRm: View the Raw Material listing from here.
nfr.associatePartWithTechnology: Click here to associate the part with technology.
nfr.pushedNfrToSap: Click here to push the cost to SAP.
nfr.back: Click here to go back to the Customer RFQ List.
nfr.back_nfrpart: Click here to go back to the Customer RFQ Part List.
nfr.add: Click here to add a new Customer RFQ.
nfr.viewOutSourcing: View the Outsourcing list from here.
nfr.vendor: Select a Vendor from the dropdown.
nfr.reset: Click here to reset the form.
nfr.add_Estimation: Click here to add New Estimation.
nfr.cancel_Estimation: Click here to cancel Update details.
nfr.save: Click here to save the Customer RFQ.
nfr.sendForApproval: Click here to send the Customer RFQ for approval.
nfr.costingVersion: Here you can see all the versions of created costings.
nfr.addCosting: Select the costing version from the dropdown, after you can add the costing from here.
nfr.editCosting: Select the costing version from the dropdown, after you can edit the costing from here.
nfr.viewCosting: Select the costing version from the dropdown, after you can view the costing from here.
nfr.deleteCosting: Select the costing version from the dropdown, after you can delete the costing from here.
nfr.copyCosting: Select the costing version from the dropdown, after you can copy the costing from here.
nfr.discardCosting: Remove the added row from here.
nfr.nfr_RowEdit: Click here to update the vendor.
nfr.floatingFilterInput: Here you can search for specific column-wise data.
nfr.floatingFilterButton: Here you can filter the data based on different conditions.

addNfr.nfr_version: Specify the version of the Customer RFQ.
addNfr.product_code: Click here to select the product code from the dropdown.
addNfr.plant: Click here to select the plant code.
addNfr.header_material: Specify the header material for the Customer RFQ.
addNfr.uom: Click here to select the unit of measurement(UOM) from the dropdown.
addNfr.quantity: Enter the quantity associated with the Customer RFQ.
addNfr.parttype: Click here to select the part type.
addNfr.reset: Click here to reset the Customer RFQ.
addNfr.add: Click here to add the Customer RFQ part.
addNfr.submit: Click here to submit the Customer RFQ.
